name: Brick City: Earthquake rescue
description:
This is our contribution to GDevelops first Game Jam.

The idea came from Teemu in the dawn of the start of the game jam and we had a walk with the dogs while talking about what to do and we had a semi working prototype done in a weekends time.

It's been awfully fun project to attend to thus far and we're really excited to participate in the jam and see how we are doing in the competition.

Enjoy!

Final release v1.0.2202215
